- Automatic resolution: Handling simple issues automatically.
- Escalation: Sending complex cases to human agents.
- Performance tracking: Monitoring how well the system is working.

The prompt must be under 40 words. I need to ensure it's concise and covers all these aspects in one sentence.

Make sure it's plain English: Yes, it uses simple terms.

Refine for clarity: Perhaps specify "retail chain customer support" to be more precise.
